solution_line_template: The vampire and werewolf need {vampire_drain_rate} + {werewolf_eat_rate} = <<{vampire_drain_rate}+{werewolf_eat_rate}={combined_rate_per_week}>>{combined_rate_per_week} people a week.
A village of {total_village_people} people will last them both {total_village_people} / {combined_rate_per_week} = <<{total_village_people}/{combined_rate_per_week}={weeks_last}>>{weeks_last} weeks.
